pageContext.claim: “You've seen my rallies, my speeches I'm selling out stadiums, and the other side can sell 500 seats, a thousand seats.”
pageContext.analysis: Our review of Trump's crowd estimates found he multiplied his crowd sizes by a factor of 3.5, at minimum. At nine such rallies this year, the president’s estimates came to 352,600 people combined. Our review of official counts and news reports shows the number was much lower: 100,972.
